eventDecorators.name: BetSessionOpened
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

eventDecorators.name: NewBetPlaced
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

eventDecorators.name: SessionResultAnnounced
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: announcesSessionResultAndPay
functionDecorators.description: Announces the winning result for the betting session and pays out winners.

parameterDecorators.name: minAmount
parameterDecorators.description: the minimum amount to be allowed when placing bets.

parameterDecorators.name: duration
parameterDecorators.description: the time frame duration that the session will be open for bets.

parameterDecorators.name: fee
parameterDecorators.description: the house fee that will be paid to the contract's owner.

functionDecorators.name: placeBet
functionDecorators.description: Allows a player to place a bet on a specific outcome (head or tail).

parameterDecorators.name: option
parameterDecorators.description: Bet option chosen by the player. Allowed values are 0 (Heads) and 1 (Tails).
